message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the potential it holds for you, I propose a price of $9,500 for the product. This price not only reflects its worth but also offers a reasonable profit margin for me. I understand that you might be looking for a more competitive price, but I assure you that this investment will pay off in the long run. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction.
